verse.name: v1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}The Lord He is God The Lord He is God The Lord He is God and He reigns sovereignly over all.{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: {lang-eng}I want to thank You for Your saving power I want to thank You for Your keeping power I want to thank You for the love You shower From the bottom of my heart.{/lang-eng}
